column1: Uchi////So good. Melt in your mouth good. Makes your jaws tingle just thinking about it good. My fav here has to be the hotate. Not a fan of brussel sprouts except when it's at Uchi! The fried milk and cookies is delish! Cold
column2: frozen milk in the form of sorbet followed by a bite of the warm fried milk will put you in heaven with each bite. Beware though
column3: prices are steep. Totally worth it though! And usually can get an appetizer comped. Staff is very attentive and friendly. Love it here!
